statements: SELECT * FROM assessment_results WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT assessment_type, assessment_score FROM assessment_results WHERE assessment_score > 80
SELECT student_id, assessment_type FROM assessment_results WHERE assessment_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT * FROM assessment_results ORDER BY assessment_score DESC
SELECT DISTINCT assessment_type FROM assessment_results
SELECT * FROM assessment_results WHERE student_id = 1 AND assessment_type = 'Midterm' ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, AVG(assessment_score) as average_score FROM assessment_results GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY average_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM assessment_results WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY assessment_score DESC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(student_id) as total_assessments FROM assessment_results GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_assessments > 2 ORDER BY total_assessments DESC;

SELECT assessment_type, AVG(assessment_score) as average_score FROM assessment_results WHERE assessment_type LIKE '%Final%' GROUP BY assessment_type HAVING average_score > 80 ORDER BY average_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM AssessmentResults;
SELECT student_id, assessment_score FROM AssessmentResults WHERE assessment_score > 80;
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_date FROM AssessmentResults ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, assessment_score FROM AssessmentResults WHERE student_id = 123 ORDER BY assessment_score DESC;
SELECT progress_date, progress_description FROM ProgressReports WHERE progress_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY progress_date;
SELECT * FROM AssessmentResults WHERE assessment_score > 80 ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, assessment_name, assessment_score FROM AssessmentResults WHERE assessment_score < 60 ORDER BY assessment_score ASC;
SELECT assessment_name, MAX(assessment_score) AS max_score FROM AssessmentResults GROUP BY assessment_name;
SELECT student_id, progress_description FROM ProgressReports WHERE progress_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS total_students, AVG(assessment_score) AS avg_score FROM AssessmentResults;
SELECT student_name, disability_type FROM students;
SELECT student_id, gender, date_of_birth FROM students WHERE disability_type = 'Physical';
SELECT * FROM assessment_results WHERE result_score > 90;
SELECT student_name, report_date, report_details FROM students JOIN progress_reports ON students.student_id = progress_reports.student_id;
SELECT student_name, assessment_date, result_score FROM students JOIN assessment_results ON students.student_id = assessment_results.student_id ORDER BY result_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM students WHERE disability_type IS NULL;
SELECT student_name, assessment_type, result_score FROM students JOIN assessment_results ON students.student_id = assessment_results.student_id WHERE result_score >= 80;
SELECT student_name, report_date, report_details FROM students JOIN progress_reports ON students.student_id = progress_reports.student_id;
SELECT student_name, disability_type, assessment_date, result_score FROM students LEFT JOIN assessment_results ON students.student_id = assessment_results.student_id WHERE result_score IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM StudentAssessments;
SELECT student_id, assessment_score FROM StudentAssessments WHERE assessment_score > 80;
SELECT student_id, assessment_date FROM StudentAssessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM StudentProgressReports WHERE progress_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY progress_date;
SELECT d.disability_name, s.student_id FROM Disabilities d JOIN StudentDisabilities s ON d.disability_id = s.disability_id;
SELECT * FROM StudentAssessments ORDER BY assessment_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_id, assessment_date FROM StudentAssessments WHERE assessment_score > 80;
SELECT s.student_id, d.disability_name FROM StudentDisabilities sd JOIN Disabilities d ON sd.disability_id = d.disability_id JOIN StudentAssessments s ON sd.student_id = s.student_id;
SELECT s.*, p.progress_description FROM StudentProgressReports p JOIN StudentAssessments s ON p.student_id = s.student_id WHERE p.progress_date >= CURDATE();
SELECT MAX(assessment_score) AS max_score, MIN(assessment_score) AS min_score FROM StudentAssessments;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM Students WHERE grade_level = 10;
SELECT * FROM Assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, progress_description FROM Students JOIN ProgressReports ON Students.student_id = ProgressReports.student_id;
SELECT DISTINCT disability_type FROM Students JOIN Disabilities ON Students.disability_type = Disabilities.disability_name;
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC, grade_level ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM Students WHERE disability_type = 'Visual Impairment';

SELECT student_name, progress_date, progress_description FROM Students JOIN ProgressReports ON Students.student_id = ProgressReports.student_id WHERE grade_level >= 3 ORDER BY progress_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT Teachers.teacher_name, COUNT(Students.student_id) AS num_students FROM Teachers LEFT JOIN Students ON Teachers.teacher_id = Students.teacher_id GROUP BY Teachers.teacher_name HAVING num_students > 3 ORDER BY num_students DESC;

SELECT disability_name, AVG(assessment_score) AS avg_score FROM Disabilities JOIN Students ON Disabilities.disability_id = Students.disability_id JOIN Assessments ON Students.student_id = Assessments.student_id GROUP BY disability_name ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
